T02D2866:207a-1: n'i l'amba ra dha ra au pa siddhi n'a ma /
T02D2866:207a-3: gos sngon po can gyi dngos grub nye ba zhes bya ba /
T02D2866:207a-4: bcom ldan 'das gos sngon po can la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2866:207a-5: bla ma dang ni rdo rje 'dzin //
T02D2866:207a-6: thugs rje'i chu rgyun bdag po la //
T02D2866:207a-7: rtag tu brjed med yid kyis mos //
T02D2866:207a-8: mchod rten sngon po'i gdams ngag bshad //
T02D2866:207a-10: dbang dang gdams ngag thob nas kyang //
T02D2866:207a-11: myur du nus pa 'byung ba dang //
T02D2866:207a-12: dngos grub rnam gnyis nye ba'i phyir //
T02D2866:207a-13: nye byed sku gdung mchod rten bsgrub //
T02D2866:207a-14: rnal 'byor dam tshig la gnas pa //
T02D2866:207a-15: bla ma'i man ngag byin rlabs kyis //
T02D2866:207a-17: rgyu dang byin gyis brlab pa dang //
T02D2866:207a-18: dbang bskur ba dang mchod pa dang //
T02D2866:207a-19: bskor ba bya dang yon tan no //
T02D2866:207a-20: gser dngul zangs lcags dung yang rung //
T02D2866:207a-21: rva shing 'dag pa la sogs pa //
T02D2866:207a-22: h'um gi bskyed rim ldan pa yis //
T02D2866:207a-23: drag po'i gtor tshogs mdun du ni //
T02D2866:207a-24: dbang bskur chas bsgyur bzo bo yis //
T02D2866:207a-25: beed'urya 'dra legs par byug / bum pa'i nang du rgya shog la //
T02D2866:207a-26: sku gsung thugs dang yon tan la //
T02D2866:207a-27: snying po thams cad bris te gzhug / bla ma grub thob brgyud pa dang //
T02D2866:207a-28: rtsa ba'i lha yi mtshan dag dang //
T02D2866:207a-29: ming dang gsang mtshan gzhug pa ni //
T02D2866:207a-30: sku gdung byin rlabs snying po gzhug / srog shing la sogs me tog phreng //
T02D2866:207a-31: mdzes pa'i rgyan gyis spras par bya //
T02D2866:207a-32: dbang bskur du ma gzhung bzhin bya //
T02D2866:207a-33: mchod pa phyi nang rtag tu dbul //
T02D2866:207a-34: gsal zhing ma 'dres thig le ste //
T02D2866:207a-35: de las sa bon k'a ya lnga //
T02D2866:207a-36: de nyid mchod rten dag tu bstim //
T02D2866:207a-37: brgyud pa'i bla ma'ang de bzhin no //
T02D2866:207a-38: gtso bo 'khor gyis bskor ba ste //
T02D2866:207a-39: shin tu gsal bar de bzhin bsgom //
T02D2866:207a-40: brgya stong nus tshad bzlas shing bskor //
T02D2866:207a-41: lha tshogs bla ma'i thugs ka nas //
T02D2866:207a-43: mtha' yas sgrib bsregs dag par sprul //
T02D2866:207a-44: slar 'dus rang gi lus la thim //
T02D2866:207a-45: rtog sgrib rags pa ji snyed pa //
T02D2866:207a-46: skad cig gis bsregs sbyangs nas ni //
T02D2866:207b-0: rang lus shel gyi nor bu @207b bzhin //
T02D2866:207b-1: gsang ba nyi shar rdo rje bgo //
T02D2866:207b-2: phyag dang gsol bstod me tog mchod //
T02D2866:207b-3: thog med sgrib bsreg dngos grub nye //
T02D2866:207b-4: khyad par du ni yi dam myur //
T02D2866:207b-5: sgrib pa sbyangs pas mi 'dod yal //
T02D2866:207b-6: rtag tu bzlas pa bskor ldan pas //
T02D2866:207b-7: bskor bas lus kyi sdig pa 'dag / bzlas pas
T02D2866:207b-8: dag gi sdig pa 'dag / bla ma lhar bsam
T02D2866:207b-9: yid sdig dag / dag pas 'dod pa phyogs med
T02D2866:207b-10: 'phel // mdor bsdus phrin las rnam bzhi 'grub //
T02D2866:207b-11: rang sems chos sku lhar ldan na //
T02D2866:207b-12: mchog dang thun mong 'di la sbyor //
T02D2866:207b-13: snod kyi bye brag ldan par sbyin //
T02D2866:207b-14: legs nyes rin chen dug dang mtshungs //
T02D2866:207b-15: de bas gsang sngags legs par sba //
T02D2866:207b-16: snod ldan rnams kyis 'grub par shog / slob dpon
T02D2866:207b-17: klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa'i dngos grub nye bar byed
T02D2866:207b-18: pa'i mchod rten gyi man ngag rdzogs so /
T02D2866:207b-20: // / rgya gar gyi pandi ta d'i pam ka ra shr'i dzny'a na dang /
